item.title: CVE-2024-34423|2024-05-09T11:22:49.148Z -- phpbits -- Forty Four – 404 Plugin for WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in phpbits Forty Four – 404 Plugin for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Forty Four – 404 Plugin for WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.
